user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe and I need to convert 3000 USD into Euros. Can you provide me with the current exchange rate? Additionally, I would like to know the real-time stock information of Tesla (TSLA) and the live price updates of Tata Motors (TATAMOTORS).

TaskList.description: Retrieve the current exchange rate for USD to Euro.
Convert 3000 USD into Euros using the exchange rate obtained in step 1.
Fetch the real-time stock information for Tesla (TSLA).
Fetch the live price updates for Tata Motors (TATAMOTORS).
